sentence.Network_en: Object To study the chemical constituents of whole plant of Selaginella stauntoniana Spring.

sentence.Network_en: Selaginella plants generally contain a variety of biflavones, mainly amentoflavone are probable active substances for anti - cancer .

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To observe antiasthmatic effects of the alcoholic extract and the aqueous extract of Selaginella uncinata.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 观察翠云草水提物和醇提物的平喘作用.

derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, diminutive of Latin selago 'clubmoss'

means.word_mean: 1. type and sole genus of the Selaginellaceae; evergreen mosslike plants: spike moss and little club moss
